A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a very interesting movie for many reasons. Let me get the good things out of the way first: The visuals are stunning and they get better with every Star Wars movie. The credits scene was one of the best scenes in my opinion because it reminded me that the movie was over.

The Bad Things:
1.Many\, MANY plot holes
2. It felt very slow\, monotonous\, and boring at times
3. I'm convinced that Disney paid the critics who gave it top reviews
4. The movie was just not good
5. As one rotten tomatos user said: "It is essentially a 2 hour chase scene"
